meanings.definition: Adbot: a software program that performs automated tasks on the internet, typically for advertising purposes.
meanings.sent1: The adbot helped businesses by automatically posting ads online.
meanings.sent2: I saw an adbot pop up ads on websites while I was browsing.
meanings.sent3: The adbot accidentally posted ads for dog food on a cat website!
meanings.sent4: The adbot worked tirelessly, like a digital assistant promoting products.
meanings.sent5: The adbot buzzed around the internet, spreading advertisements far and wide.

meanings.definition: Adbot: a person or entity that engages in automated online advertising.
meanings.sent1: The adbot was responsible for managing online ad campaigns efficiently.
meanings.sent2: She became an adbot after learning about digital marketing strategies.
meanings.sent3: The adbot joked about getting paid in clicks instead of cash.
meanings.sent4: He transformed into an adbot, tirelessly promoting products to online audiences.
meanings.sent5: The adbot's presence online was as constant as the flow of advertisements.
